title: Bug 17825: ControlExampleText beeps when I choose SWT.MULTI
description: Bug 17825: ControlExampleText beeps when I choose SWT.MULTI. Somehow I don't think it's supposed to do that.
OB: When I click on the ControlExampleText and choose SWT.MULTI, it makes a beep sound. Furthermore, clicking on other buttons also triggers the beep sound.
EB: I expect that when I choose SWT.MULTI in the ControlExampleText, it should not produce any sound. Clicking on other buttons should also not trigger any beep sound.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
  1. Open the ControlExampleText.
  2. Click on the ControlExampleText and choose SWT.MULTI.
  3. Observe that a beep sound is produced.
  4. Click on other buttons and observe that they also trigger the beep sound.
